displayProperties.description:
[Alternate Weapon Action]  : Changes this weapon's damage type, cycling between Solar, Arc, and Void. Grants different stats based on your selected damage type.

Solar - Increases reload speed and aerial effectiveness.
Arc - Increases handling and range.
Void - Stability and aim assist.

displayProperties.description:
Dodging grants the following to nearby Aeon Cult allies:
Grenade energy to Warlocks
Melee energy to Titans
Dodge energy to Hunters

Other allies receive a fraction of the shared energy.
displayProperties.name: Aeon Energy

displayProperties.description: Dodging disorients nearby enemies and temporarily removes their radar.
displayProperties.name: Misdirection

displayProperties.description:
Melee grants the following to nearby Aeon Cult allies:
Grenade energy to Warlocks
Melee energy to Titans
Dodge energy to Hunters

Other allies receive a fraction of the shared energy.
displayProperties.name: Aeon Energy

displayProperties.description: Solar final blows recharge your Barricade, which unleashes a blast of Solar energy that scorches targets when summoned.
displayProperties.name: Solar Rampart

displayProperties.description:
Throwing grenades grants the following to nearby Aeon Cult allies:
Grenade energy to Warlocks
Melee energy to Titans
Dodge energy to Hunters

Other allies receive a fraction of the shared energy.
displayProperties.name: Aeon Energy

displayProperties.description: Rifts periodically release Arc shockwaves. Final blows with these shockwaves create an Arc explosion. While an Arc Super is equipped, the shockwaves and subsequent explosions blind nearby targets. Rift energy recharges faster when you are surrounded by targets.
displayProperties.name: Planetary Torrent

displayProperties.description: Improves Skip Grenade, and you gain an additional Skip Grenade charge. Skip Grenade returns energy when it damages enemies.
displayProperties.name: New Tricks

displayProperties.description: Increases the duration of any invisibility effects. While you are invisible, your melee recharges faster, your weapons reload faster, and your Recovery is greatly increased.
displayProperties.name: Vanishing Shadow

displayProperties.description: Targets that enter Ward of Dawn are blinded, while allies that pass through gain a weapon damage boost. Guarding with Sentinel Shield blinds nearby targets.
displayProperties.name: Starless Night

displayProperties.description: Grants an overshield when you're sprinting at full health with Seismic Strike, Hammer Strike, or Shield Bash equipped and charged. Hits with these abilities recharge a portion of your melee energy.
displayProperties.name: Seriously, Watch Out

displayProperties.description: Weapons ready and reload very quickly. Provides a small benefit to the airborne effectiveness stat of all weapons.
displayProperties.name: Cobra Totemic

displayProperties.description: Your Rift provides damage reduction to allied Guardians standing in it. Grants Rift energy when you are critically wounded. On your death, creates a healing rift on your corpse.
displayProperties.name: Dearly Departed

displayProperties.description: Complete challenges in strikes during Season 2 to earn this ornament. It's unlocked for all Crucible armor sets.
displayProperties.name: Soaring Sword Ornament
